RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 38. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DESDEMONA KAY dueled to the turn, shook free into the stretch and went clear late to hold sway to the wire. EMERALD EYES off pace to turn, rallied along three wide into stretch for place. SISSY'S MAY no speed to the stretch, passed a couple for show spot. PEARL PEARL PEARL raced along evenly with no late response when needed. CABARET FLEUR inside duel to turn, gave way readily in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Pearl Pearl Pearl
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace to turn, rallied along three wide into stretch for place

ENTRY.NAME: Sissy's May
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, passed a couple for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Cabaret Fleur
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside duel to turn, gave way readily in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Desdemona Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to the turn, shook free into the stretch, went clear late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 13100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 16, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Consid ered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NORTHERN DIAMOND slow into stride, rushed early, tracked to the turn, took over off rail and went clear in the final furlong while ridden out to the wire. GOSHEN inside to the front, dueled quarter pole, no match in late going. CLEVER TALE inside run to turn, ran on to improve for show spot in stretch. E STREET ANGEL three wide run to stretch with no late kick in the drive. ROSE RING could not keep up from inside, never a menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up from inside, never a menace

ENTRY.NAME: Clever Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to turn, ran on to improve for show spot in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Goshen
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside to the front, dueled quarter pole, no match in late going

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride, rushed early, tracked, took over, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: E Street Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide run to stretch with no late kick in the drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 77. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 16, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5, 000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALK RADIO steadied along inside through the first turn to the half, jammed up to far turn, stayed on gamely to be along in time at the wire. TRAUMARAMA just off leader between horses to far turn, out-gamed to the finish just holding the place spot. I LIKEM close up while never far back while off rail throughout with a late rush in the final seventy yards to the wire for show spot. CALTHA set pace to the stretch well handled, weakened in final stages. EMBARRASSING inside trip with no response when needed in the stretch run. FIVE QUEENS saved ground throughout with a steady back from the half.

ENTRY.NAME: Five Queens
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with a steady back from the half

ENTRY.NAME: Embarrassing
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip with no response when needed in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Radio
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied along inside first turn, jammed up to far turn, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Traumarama
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader between horses to far turn, outgamed to wire

ENTRY.NAME: I Likem
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up never far back while off rail throughout, late rush wire

ENTRY.NAME: Caltha
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace to the stretch well handled, weakened in final stages

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY TALLULAH angled out quickly three wide run past quarter pole and cleared off in the final furlong under stout handling to the wire. MUCHA unhurried to the turn, rallied wide into stretch while no match. UNREGRETTED pressed pace to the turn, weakened in the stretch for show spot. AUNTJOBUSINESS brief speed from inside to the turn, gave way readily in stretch. AADYA brief speed between horses to turn, gave way readily in stretch. GRACE'S GIFT steadily faded from inside and never menaced in the stretch run. LITTLE RIOT GRRL dropped back quickly from the gate always far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Unregretted
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to the turn, weakened in the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Gift
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadily faded from inside while never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Auntjobusiness
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed from inside to the turn, gave way readily in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: My Tallulah
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled out quickly three wide run past quarter pole, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: Aadya
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed between horses to turn, gave way readily in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Little Riot Grrl
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back quickly from the gate always far back

ENTRY.NAME: Mucha
ENTRY.OWNER: Claiborne Farm and Dilschneider, Adele B.
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, rallied wide into stretch while no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1 1/16M Turf CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this ra ce will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMANDA'S CHALLENGE never far back good position to far turn three wide run to go clear to the wire. BRIC A BRAC saved ground throughout while evenly along, angled out past the quarter pole for place spot. OUR FLAG FLYING dueled to far turn with a brief lead in the stretch run but outkicked to the wire. HONEYTOWN off rail run to far turn never far back while along evenly through the stretch run. SWIGERT inside speed, dueled to far turn but came up empty in the stretch and faded. WILMA inside run throughout with no response when needed in the stretch. PLEASANT SKY broke outwards at the start and never menaced always trailing.

ENTRY.NAME: Bric a Brac
ENTRY.OWNER: Harrison Ann M and Hendrickson Renata D
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout while evenly along angled out for place

ENTRY.NAME: Swigert
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, dueled to far turn but came up empty in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Our Flag Flying
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to far turn with a brief lead in the stretch run outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Wilma
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run throughout with no response when needed in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Honeytown
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to far turn never far back, along evenly stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Amanda's Challenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back good position to far turn three wide run, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Pleasant Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwards at the start and never menaced always trailing

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DISCOUNT DENNIS broke slow from inside, ran up outside to the turn cruised past four wide and lasted to the wire under steady handling. TROY BOY three wide speed to turn, cleared to quarter pole while no match in the late going. GUS GUS tried to keep up to turn, rallied along in late going from between foes to the wire for show spot in a good effort. LET'S GO JOHN no speed to the stretch, improved position only while no real threat. HICKORY BILL brief speed from inside, gave way steadily from the turn. TOMMY POINT brief duel, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Discount Dennis
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow, ran up outside turn cruised past four wide, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Hickory Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed from inside, gave way steadily from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Tommy Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief duel, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go John
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, improved position only while no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Gus Gus
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to turn rallied along in late going between foes

ENTRY.NAME: Troy Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide speed to turn, cleared to quarter pole, no match late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED IN 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 16, 2023 Allow ed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LET'S BE CLEAR secured inside to the turn, angled out into the stretch with a late burst to edge clear.under steady handling to the wire SONADOR dueled from two path, cleared into stretch, run down late stages. BUCKEYE BLING between horses early on, shuffled back, came on for show spot. A LOT OF SPUNK good position to turn, rallied in the stretch with no late kick. SEAWARD inside suel to turn, gave way readily in the stretch run. CANADA CANDY tried to keep up to the stretch while empty at the half, faded ba.

ENTRY.NAME: A Lot of Spunk
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride, rallied in the stretch with no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Be Clear
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernard L Barrett and Stephens Terry L
ENTRY.COMMENT: secured the inside to turn, angled out with a late burst clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: The Estate of Tommy G. Ligon

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Bling
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early on, shuffled back, came on for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Canada Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the stretch while empty at the half, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Seaward
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside suel to turn, gave way readily in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Sonador
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two path, cleared into stretch, run down late stages

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, thi s race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUNLEATHER AL perfect position throughout, rallied along off rail to far turn, kept on in the stretch to edge off under good handling to the wire. SOUTHERN BREEZE chased pace to the half, moved to lead far turn, weakened late. JARED THE WARRIOR raced along evenly throughout while passing a couple for show. RAGING WHIRLWIND close to pace throughout with no late kick when needed. MR YETTIE unhurried early, raced along to far turn, passed tiring ones late. MIGHTY RIOT quick speed to front, led to the half, gave way readily. PINK SOLITAIRE tried to keep up for a half with nothing left and faded back.

ENTRY.NAME: Mighty Riot
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed to front, led to the half, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the half, moved to lead far turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Pink Solitaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up for a half with nothing left and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Whirlwind
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace throughout with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Jared the Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout while passing a couple for show

ENTRY.NAME: Gunleather Al
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect position throughout, rallied along in stretch to edge off

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Yettie
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, raced along to far turn, passed tiring ones late
